message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at the value.
I think we can both do better.  I'll take $55, and you get $45. This way, we both get a fair share and avoid the risk of inflation eating into our gains.
Bob, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest outcome.  Let's wrap this up before inflation hurts us both further.
